channel.title: How to edit 508 Commands
channel.description:
Hey I need help on how to change the rights That people are allowed to do the commands Please Help
Thanks!!!!!!!! It says CMD [0] I need to know what to change to change the rights thanks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: How to edit 508 Commands
item.dc:creator: @undertaxxx undertaxxx
item.description:
@undertaxxx wrote:

rep++ plox of this helped. :rolleyes:

I’ll explain using an example:

This will be usable by all players.


if(cmd[0].equals("meberich")) 
{
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 999999999);  
}

This will be usable by mod +


if(cmd[0].equals("meberich") && (p.rights >= 1)) 
{
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 999999999);  
}

So practicly you can add/change/delete the " && (p.rights >= 1)" if you want it/dont want it to be mod+

you can change " && (p.rights >= 1)" to " && (p.rights >= 2)" if you want it admin only for example…

Or " && p.isMember == true" can also be used if you want it to be for members only…

Or For One User ONLY add :

if (p.username.equals("PLAYERNAME")) {

afther

if (cmd[0].equals("COMMANDNAME")) {

So it’ll look like:

if (cmd[0].equals("COMMANDNAME")) {
if (p.username.equals("PLAYERNAME")) {
(here the rest of the code) }}
else { (blablabla) }}

Read full topic
